fact: You can click on the title of the story to see top comments from reddit
Icon on the top right represents the site where the story is from
You can click on the drop-down on the right to browse other popuplar sub-reddits
You can click on the image to see the original story
You can open the title link in a new window (by right clicking on it) to see all reddit comments
If you use Chrome}, you can add this site to your browser via the Chrome Web Store
This site will auto-update every 60 seconds. No need to keep hitting refresh! :)
